entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.5°C

Humidity: 73 %

Wind: WNW 10 km/h

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
